00030 void AdaBoostClassifier::Clear()
00031 {
00032         delete[] scs; scs=NULL;
00033         delete[] alphas; alphas=NULL;
00034         count = 0;
00035         thresh = 0.0;
00036 }

00038 AdaBoostClassifier& AdaBoostClassifier::operator=(const AdaBoostClassifier& source)
00039 {
00040         InitToGivenSize(source.count);
00041         count = source.count;
00042         thresh = source.thresh;
00043         memcpy(alphas,source.alphas,sizeof(*alphas)*count);
00044         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) scs[i] = source.scs[i];
00045         return *this;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void AdaBoostClassifier::InitToGivenSize(const int size)
00049 {
00050         Clear();
00051         count = 0;
00052         thresh = 0.0;
00053         alphas = new REAL[size]; ASSERT(alphas!=NULL);
00054         scs = new SimpleClassifier[size]; ASSERT(scs!=NULL);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void AdaBoostClassifier::WriteToFile(ofstream& f) const
00058 {
00059         f<<count<<endl;
00060         f<<thresh<<endl;
00061         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) f<<alphas[i]<<" ";
00062         f<<endl;
00063         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) scs[i].WriteToFile(f);
00064         f<<endl;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void AdaBoostClassifier::ReadFromFile(ifstream& f)
00068 {
00069         Clear();
00070         f>>count; ASSERT(count>0);
00071         f.ignore(256,'\n');
00072         scs = new SimpleClassifier[count]; ASSERT(scs!=NULL);
00073         alphas = new REAL[count]; ASSERT(alphas!=NULL);
00074         
00075         f>>thresh; f.ignore(256,'\n');
00076         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) f>>alphas[i]; f.ignore(256,'\n');
00077         for(int i=0;i<count;i++) scs[i].ReadFromFile(f); f.ignore(256,'\n');
00078 }

00080 void AdaBoostClassifier::TrainAdaBoost(int rounds,const bool update,const int method)
00081 {
00082         ofstream f;
00083         int i,j;
00084         REAL* curresult;
00085         int fn,fp;
00086         bool* used;
00087 
00088         InitToGivenSize(rounds);
00089         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++) FillTheTable(gTable[i],gClassifiers[i]);
00090         InitializeWeights();
00091         used = new bool[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(used!=NULL);
00092         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++) used[i]=false;
00093 
00094         f.open(gAda_Log_Filename);
00095         curresult = new REAL[gTotalCount];      ASSERT(curresult!=NULL);
00096         f<<gFaceCount<<"\t"<<gTotalCount-gFaceCount<<endl;
00097         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) curresult[i] = 0.0;
00098         for(i=0;i<rounds;i++)
00099         {
00100                 int err;
00101 
00102                 if(asym_ratio>1.0) SkewWeight(asym_ratio);
00103                 AddOneSimpleClassifier(used);
00104                 for(j=0;j<gTotalCount;j++) curresult[j] += (alphas[i] * scs[i].Apply(gTrainSet[j]));
00105 
00106                 err = 0;
00107                 for(j=0;j<gTotalCount;j++)
00108                         if( (curresult[j]<thresh && gTrainSet[j].label==1) || (curresult[j]>=thresh && gTrainSet[j].label==0) )
00109                                 err++;
00110                 f<<i<<"\t"<<err<<endl;
00111                 f<<i<<"\t"<<alphas[i]<<"\t"<<scs[i].thresh<<" "<<scs[i].parity<<" "<<scs[i].type<<" "<<scs[i].x1<<" "<<scs[i].x2<<" "<<scs[i].x3<<" "<<scs[i].x4<<" "<<scs[i].y1<<" "<<scs[i].y2<<" "<<scs[i].y3<<" "<<scs[i].y4<<endl;
00112         }
00113         nth_element(curresult+gFaceCount,curresult+gFaceCount+int((gTotalCount-gFaceCount)*(1-gNode_fp_Goal)),curresult+gTotalCount);
00114         switch(method)
00115         {
00116                 case GOAL_METHOD_MIN_ERROR: 
00117                         break;
00118                 case GOAL_METHOD_VALID_DR: 
00119                         ValidateTheThreshold(*this,f); 
00120                         break;
00121                 case GOAL_METHOD_FIX_FP: 
00122                         thresh = curresult[gFaceCount+int((gTotalCount-gFaceCount)*(1-gNode_fp_Goal))]; 
00123                         break;
00124         }
00125         fn = 0; for(i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++) if(curresult[i]<thresh) fn++;
00126         fp = 0; for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) if(curresult[i]>=thresh) fp++;
00127         f<<fn<<"\t"<<fp<<endl;
00128         f<<"Validation Error:"<<endl;
00129         fn = 0; for(i=0;i<gValidFaceCount;i++) if(ApplyImagePatch(gValidationSet[i])==0) fn++;
00130         fp = 0; for(i=gValidFaceCount;i<gValidationCount;i++) if(ApplyImagePatch(gValidationSet[i])==1) fp++;
00131         f<<fn<<"\t"<<fp<<endl;
00132         f.close();
00133         
00134         if(update) AppendAdaBoostClassifier(*this);
00135         delete[] used; used=NULL;
00136         delete[] curresult; curresult = NULL;
00137 }

00139 void AdaBoostClassifier::TrainLDS(int rounds,const bool update,const int method)
00140 {
00141         REAL* curresult;
00142         int i,j;
00143         ofstream f;
00144         int fn,fp;
00145 
00146         if(gTrain_Method==TRAIN_ADA)
00147         TrainAdaBoost(rounds,false,method);
00148         else if(gTrain_Method==TRAIN_FFS)
00149                 ForwardFeatureSelection(*this,rounds,false,method);
00150 
00151         if(linear_classifier==LC_LAC || linear_classifier==LC_FDA)
00152         {
00153                 WithinClassScatter(*this);
00154                 curresult = new REAL[gTotalCount]; ASSERT(curresult!=NULL);
00155                 for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) curresult[i]=0.0;
00156                 for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00157                         for(j=0;j<count;j++)
00158                                 curresult[i] += alphas[j]*scs[j].Apply(gTrainSet[i]);
00159 
00160                 nth_element(curresult+gFaceCount,curresult+gFaceCount+int((gTotalCount-gFaceCount)*(1-gNode_fp_Goal)),curresult+gTotalCount);
00161                 if(gTrain_Method==TRAIN_ADA)
00162                         f.open(gAda_Log_Filename, ios_base::out|ios_base::app);
00163                 else if(gTrain_Method==TRAIN_FFS)
00164                         f.open(FFS_log_filename, ios_base::out|ios_base::app);
00165                 switch(method)
00166                 {
00167                         case GOAL_METHOD_MIN_ERROR: 
00168                                 break;
00169                         case GOAL_METHOD_VALID_DR: 
00170                                 ValidateTheThreshold(*this,f); 
00171                                 break;
00172                         case GOAL_METHOD_FIX_FP: 
00173                                 thresh = curresult[gFaceCount+int((gTotalCount-gFaceCount)*(1-gNode_fp_Goal))]; 
00174                                 break;
00175                 }
00176                 fn = 0; for(i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++) if(ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i])==0) fn++;
00177                 fp = 0; for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) if(ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i])==1) fp++;
00178                 f<<fn<<"\t"<<fp<<endl;
00179                 f<<"LDS  Error:"<<endl;
00180                 fn = 0; for(i=0;i<gValidFaceCount;i++) if(ApplyImagePatch(gValidationSet[i])==0) fn++;
00181                 fp = 0; for(i=gValidFaceCount;i<gValidationCount;i++) if(ApplyImagePatch(gValidationSet[i])==1) fp++;
00182                 f<<fn<<"\t"<<fp<<endl;  
00183                 f.close();
00184                 delete[] curresult; curresult=NULL;
00185         }
00186         if(update) AppendAdaBoostClassifier(*this);
00187 }
00188 
00189 void SingleFeatureClassifier(const int* const labels,SimpleClassifier& sc,const int* const indexes)
00190 {
00191         int i;
00192         REAL min1; REAL min2;
00193         REAL e1,e2;
00194         int pos1,pos2;
00195 
00196         // compute errors1, suppose parity is 1, that is f(x)<thresh ==> h(x) = 1
00197         // compute errors2, suppose parity is 0, that is f(x)>thresh ==> h(x) = 1
00198         e1 = 0.0; for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) if(labels[i]!=0) e1+=gWeights[i];
00199         e2 = REAL(1.0)-e1;
00200         min1 = e1; pos1 = 0;
00201         min2 = e2; pos2 = 0;
00202         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00203         {
00204                 if(labels[indexes[i]]!=0) e1-=gWeights[indexes[i]]; else e1+=gWeights[indexes[i]];
00205                 if(e1<min1) { min1=e1; pos1=i; }
00206                 e2 = 1 - e1;
00207                 if(e2<min2) { min2=e2; pos2=i; }
00208         }
00209 
00210         pos1++; if(pos1==gTotalCount) pos1--;
00211         pos2++; if(pos2==gTotalCount) pos2--;
00212         if(min1<min2)
00213         {
00214                 sc.parity = 1;
00215                 sc.error = min1;
00216                 sc.thresh = sc.GetOneFeature(gTrainSet[indexes[pos1]]);
00217         }
00218         else
00219         {
00220                 sc.parity = 0;
00221                 sc.error = min2;
00222                 sc.thresh = sc.GetOneFeature(gTrainSet[indexes[pos2]]);
00223         }
00224 }
00225 
00226 void AdaBoostClassifier::AddOneSimpleClassifier(bool* used)
00227 {
00228         int i;
00229         REAL alpha,beta;
00230         SimpleClassifier minsc;
00231         REAL minerror;
00232         int minindex;
00233 
00234         minerror = REAL(1.01); minindex  = -1;
00235         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) gLabels[i] = gTrainSet[i].label;
00236         NormalizeWeight();
00237         TRACE("%f %f %f %f\n",*min_element(gWeights,gWeights+gFaceCount)*10000,*max_element(gWeights,gWeights+gFaceCount)*10000,
00238                      *min_element(gWeights+gFaceCount,gWeights+gTotalCount)*10000,*max_element(gWeights+gFaceCount,gWeights+gTotalCount)*10000);
00239         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00240         {
00241                 if(used[i]) continue;
00242                 SingleFeatureClassifier(gLabels,gClassifiers[i],gTable[i]);
00243                 if(gClassifiers[i].error<minerror)
00244                 {
00245                         minerror = gClassifiers[i].error;
00246                         minsc = gClassifiers[i];
00247                         minindex = i;
00248                 }
00249         }
00250 
00251         used[minindex] = true;
00252         beta = minsc.error / (REAL(1.0)-minsc.error);
00253         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++)
00254                 if(minsc.Apply(gTrainSet[i]) == gTrainSet[i].label)
00255                         gWeights[i] *= beta;
00256         if(beta<REAL(1e-8)) beta = REAL(1e-8);
00257         alpha = -log(beta);
00258 
00259         scs[count] = minsc;
00260         alphas[count] = alpha;
00261         thresh += (REAL(0.5)*alpha);
00262         count++;
00263 }
